short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I simplify understanding of the text on the web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our revolutionary Chrome extension, "Minihint" â€“ the ultimate tool for seamless and efficient understanding of the texts. With just a right-click, users can unlock the additional information about specific unclear peace of text.

Key Features:

1. Instant Analysis:
   By simply right-clicking on any webpage, users can access a comprehensive additional information about the initial text in seconds. No need to navigate through complex menus or search for information manually.

2. User-Friendly Interface:
   Minihint is designed with simplicity in mind. The user interface is intuitive and easy.

Why Users Love It:

- Time-Saving:
  No more digging through multiple pages searching answers on regular questions.

- Empowerment:
  Users gain a deeper understanding of the websites they interact with.

- Education and Awareness:
  Individuals can become more aware of literally any topic they are interested in.

In a digital landscape where transparency and awareness are paramount, Minihint stands out as an indispensable tool.
